new-subdomain-filesvisuallysyncedxyz.title: New Subdomain: files.visuallysynced.xyz
new-subdomain-filesvisuallysyncedxyz.content:
I've decided to create a subdomain dedicated to hosting public files.

# Why?

It'll make providing download links easier and will serve as a convenient storage space for screenshots and other files.

# Where will you host it?

I've chosen Firebase as the hosting platform because it's more convenient and won't require storing the files in github res or just reuploading the folder in netlify.

also this is how it works:

list and click to download: <https://files.visuallysynced.xyz/>
know what ur downloading and  and click to download: <https://files.visuallysynced.xyz/download/?file=activate.ps1>
Thats for now, bai bai.

activate-windows-1011.title: How to activate Windows 10/11
activate-windows-1011.content:
Are you a windows user who doesn't want to waste money on a license to activate spyware but still wants to activate it?
I gotchu:

# Activate Manually

1. Run cmd as administrator
2. Install KMS client key, pick a license key and use the command:

```
License Keys:
Home: TX9XD-98N7V-6WMQ6-BX7FG-H8Q99
Home N: 3KHY7-WNT83-DGQKR-F7HPR-844BM
Home Single Language: 7HNRX-D7KGG-3K4RQ-4WPJ4-YTDFH
Home Country Specific: PVMJN-6DFY6-9CCP6-7BKTT-D3WVR
Professional: W269N-WFGWX-YVC9B-4J6C9-T83GX
Professional N: MH37W-N47XK-V7XM9-C7227-GCQG9
Education: NW6C2-QMPVW-D7KKK-3GKT6-VCFB2
Education N: 2WH4N-8QGBV-H22JP-CT43Q-MDWWJ
Enterprise: NPPR9-FWDCX-D2C8J-H872K-2YT43
Enterprise N: DPH2V-TTNVB-4X9Q3-TJR4H-KHJW4
```

```powershell
slmgr /ipk yourlicensekey
```

3. Set MsGuide KMS machine address.

```powershell
slmgr /skms kms8.msguides.com
```

4. Activate it

```powershell
slmgr /ato
```

5. Reboot (Optinal)

# Script

I made a powershell script so if your lazy to activate it your self u can:

<https://files.visuallysynced.xyz/download/?file=activate.ps1>


Hope you found it useful, bai bai.
